CreateArmor_08:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS_01>Jiahto found some ancient texts that
mention the <clr:0000>Zora greaves<clr:ffff>!

It is said that those who wear them are
gifted the power to swim in the water as
they please.
I am certain that such an item would
be invaluable in your quest to locate
Princess Zelda.
<sp:3:0:2:0701>I told Sidon and everyone in the domain
that I hope to present this special gift
to you. However...
CreateArmor_48:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS>Sir Link. I shall never forget all that you
have done for us Zora, not for the rest
of my days.
Please do not be a stranger to our
fair domain!
CreateArmor_08_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Sad_00>The greaves in question have still not
been located.

<sp:3:0:2:0701>According to the texts Jiahto found, the
Zora greaves were created long ago...

It seems they were offered up at the
<clr:0000>Ancient Zora Waterworks<clr:ffff> as a prayer for
friendship between the Zora and Hylians.
<sp:3:0:2:0301>Upon hearing that, I desperately searched
there, but I was unable to locate them.

I wonder where in the waterworks the
Zora greaves were offered...
CreateArmor_20:
<sp:3:0:2:0d00><snd:Greeting_00>Oh, Sir Link!<sp:5:1:0> Thank you for stopping by!


<sp:3:0:2:0001>As it were, I have still not located the
Zora greaves...
CreateArmor_40: <sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Notice_00>Oh, Sir Link!<sp:5:0:0> About the Zora greaves...
CreateArmor_40_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Notice_00>Oh, Sir Link!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:SurpriseS_01>Just a moment.<sp:5:0:0> What is that upon your
feet? Could those be...<sp:5:1:0>the Zora greaves?!
CreateArmor_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0d01><snd:Greeting_00>Oh, Sir Link!<sp:5:1:0> Thank you ever so much for
your noble efforts.

<sp:3:0:2:0701>I have been earnestly pondering what
I can possibly do to thank you for saving
the domain. However...
CreateArmor_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseM_00>Hm?<sp:5:1:0> You have already found it?!


<sp:3:0:2:0100>Hee-hee!<sp:5:1:0> Oh, Sir Link, I am truly no
match for you!
CreateArmor_22:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Think>It is said that those who wear the
Zora greaves are gifted the power
to swim in the water as they please.
According to the ancient text, long ago in
the distant past...<sp:0:4:0>they were offered up at the <clr:0000>Ancient Zora
Waterworks<clr:ffff> as a prayer for friendship
between the Zora and Hylians.
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Sad>In the same spirit, I hoped to gift them to
you as a symbol of the friendship the Zora
gratefully share with you. However...
CreateArmor_23:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Ease_00>The <clr:0000>Ancient Zora Waterworks<clr:ffff> is a ruin
at the bottom of the reservoir lake<sp:5:1:0>
situated in the east of the domain.
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS>Sidon found it with your help, did he not?


You can freely go inside by jumping into
the whirlpool in the reservoir lake.

<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Think_00>I was so sure the Zora greaves that
were offered long ago would be in
there. However...
CreateArmor_24:
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Sad>I thought they would prove valuable to
you.<sp:5:0:0> I am terribly sorry that I failed to
find those greaves for you.
I wonder if there are still places we have
yet to access within the waterworks...
CreateArmor_44:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseM_00>Wow!<sp:5:1:0> So a large hole opened up within
the waterworks, draining the water?

And the Zora greaves were at the bottom
of that big hole. <sp:5:1:0>Extraordinary!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Ease_01>After all that my Sidon has told me,
I can safely say that it is so like you
to find them on your own, Sir Link!
CreateArmor_44_2:
May they prove useful to you during your
noble travels.

The Zora greaves are a symbol of the
friendship between the Zora and Hylians...

As such, it is a most-fitting gift for you,
as you are truly an irreplaceable friend
to all the Zora of the domain.
CreateArmor_02_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseM_00>Hm?<sp:5:1:0> Upon your feet...<sp:5:0:0>those are the
Zora greaves, are they not?!

<sp:3:0:2:0100>Hee-hee!<sp:5:1:0> To think that after all of my
fretting, you already found them. I am
truly no match for you, Sir Link!
CreateArmor_05:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>It seems the <clr:0000>Zora greaves <clr:ffff>were offered at
the <clr:0000>Ancient Zora Waterworks<clr:ffff> at the
bottom of the East Reservoir Lake.
That is what the texts claim, in any case.
If that is correct, I wonder where in the
waterworks the greaves were offered...
CreateArmor_06:
<sp:3:0:2:0d01><snd:Greeting_00>Sir Link!


I am overjoyed that your precious
Zora armor has at last been returned
to your care.
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:Notice_00>Oh!<sp:5:0:0> Just one more thing!<sp:5:1:0> There is
something I would like to speak with
you about...
CreateArmor_46:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Ease_00>Hee-hee.<sp:5:0:0> Speaking of irreplaceable
friends...

Whenever my dear Sidon opens his
mouth, chances are it is to speak of
you, Sir Link.
<snd:Happy_00>He'll say things like, "Link is the best!"
And also, "No task is insurmountable
when I am with Link!"
I feel a bit silly telling you this, but after
all that has transpired, I truly understand
how he came to feel that way.
Sir Link... Thank you. So very much. That
he has found a true companion in you
makes me as happy as it does him.
<sp:3:0:2:0d00><snd:LaughS>Zora's Domain will always be with you,
now and forevermore. Consider that a
fervent promise.
Please do not be a stranger, dearest
friend of the domain.
CreateArmor_47:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:Notice_00>Ah! This simply will not do!<sp:5:1:0> I forgot to
tell you...

<sp:3:0:2:0100>I asked <clr:0000>Chroma<clr:ffff> and <clr:0000>Khira<clr:ffff> to try to find
some way to assist you, Sir Link.

They are now investigating something
additional to the Zora greaves...
the <clr:0000>Zora helm<clr:ffff>.
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:TalkPositive_01>I am certain that the helm will also prove
useful to you on your journey, Sir Link.<sp:5:1:0>
I hope you will speak with them about it.
